sections.heading: # API Reference
sections.prompt: API overview (3-4 paragraphs): (1) Purpose of API, (2) Installation and setup, (3) Basic usage pattern, (4) Authentication if applicable. Be technical but clear.

sections.heading: ## Core Classes
sections.prompt: Document main classes (10-15 paragraphs, one per class): For each major class: (1) Purpose, (2) Constructor parameters with types, (3) Key methods with signatures, (4) Return types, (5) Usage example. Be comprehensive and precise. Group by module.

sections.heading: ## Functions
sections.prompt: Document utility functions (6-8 paragraphs): Group by module. For each function: (1) Purpose, (2) Parameters with types and defaults, (3) Return type, (4) Example usage. Focus on public API.

sections.heading: ## Data Structures
sections.prompt: Document data types (4-6 paragraphs): Dataclasses, TypedDicts, Enums. For each: (1) Purpose, (2) Fields with types, (3) Validation rules if any, (4) Usage example.

sections.heading: ## Exceptions
sections.prompt: Document exception classes (3-4 paragraphs): List all custom exceptions. For each: (1) When raised, (2) How to handle, (3) Example. Group by module.

sections.heading: ## Usage Examples
sections.prompt: Comprehensive examples (6-8 paragraphs): (1) Basic usage, (2) Advanced usage, (3) Common patterns, (4) Integration examples. Include full code snippets with expected output.
